developer: The Football Association Premier League Ltd
description:
The new Premier League App provides real-time access to every score,
stat & story from the most watched football league in the world.


Follow the action live with Matchday Live, featuring verified live scores,
stats and stories from every match; Discover more with the PL Companion;
and Join myPremierLeague to personalise the App to the Matches, Players
and Clubs that matter most to you, play Fantasy Premier League, listen to
Premier League Radio, and watch every Premier League match ever played.


Follow live, get closer to the Premier League’s Clubs and Players, and shape

Follow every game with Matchday Live:
Verified live scores, statistics and table updates,
including links to watch official broadcasts live
wherever you are

Don’t miss a moment with Matchday Stories:
Vertical storytelling of every match from every
ground as it happens

Personalise your app with myPremierLeague:
Follow the players, Clubs and matches that
matter most to you

Listen live with Premier League Radio:
All the action as it happens from around the
Premier League (excl. UK and Ireland)

Play Fantasy Premier League:
The world’s biggest fantasy football game,
in Classic, Draft and Challenge format

Explore every Premier League match ever played:
Including video, statistics and kits since 1992

Discover clubs and players:
Get closer with behind the scenes stories

developer: Shenzhen United Power Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
****Hryfine bracelets are non-medical devices. The measurement data and results are for reference only, not for diagnosis and treatment. * * * * *

Special Reminder: APP data is for reference only and is not used as a medical diagnosis. You should consult your doctor before using APP and making any medical decisions.

1, Home Sports: record your exercise data, set exercise goals and calculate whether the goal is achieved, steps, distance, calorie consumption, etc.;

2. Sleep monitoring: it can record the sleep duration and sleep quality in the set period, and count the duration of deep sleep, light sleep and awake, so that you can improve the sleep quality;

3. When the phone searches for the bracelet, the bracelet vibrates. Find the phone through the bracelet, phone vibration and ring reminder, in case of loss.

4. It can remind the user of important information such as call, SMS, WeChat and so on when connecting with the bracelet, to prevent missing important information, etc.;

5. Set an intelligent alarm clock for the bracelet to remind you of sitting for a long time. The bracelet vibrates to remind you to reduce the problems caused by sitting for a long time

6, Remote control photography mode, anytime and anywhere to record the beautiful moment

7, statistics your daily, monthly, weekly exercise, sleep, data display at a glance

8. You can set the bracelet to turn the wrist to light up the screen and light up the screen easily

9. Sports data report: make statistics of your sports data and average data in the last 30 days, as well as your sports standards in the last seven days, and generate reports for easy viewing of sports trends

Welcome to SSEN App, the ultimate live streaming and score tracking app for all major sports leagues in India! Our app provides you with world-class features and viewing experience, along with vital statistics about your favourite players, leagues, and teams.

With our app, you can enjoy live matches and events, match highlights, league information, team groups and standings, club profiles, and much more. All our free content is available, for ease of access. 

Download SSEN App today and enjoy the ultimate sports experience in India!

The Ultimate Sports Entertainment Platform

DAZN is the only truly global pure-play sports entertainment platform. We uniquely integrate the entire fan experience for fans to watch, play, and socialize, all in one place.

Watch Anytime, Anywhere.
Experience sports like never before. Stream your favourite events live or on demand, on any device, from anywhere in the world. DAZN delivers the game to you, wherever you are.

Play in FanZone and Beyond
Dive into the action with FanZone. Chat live, send reactions, and connect with fellow fans in real-time. It’s your front-row seat to the heart of the game.

Connect with Fans
Join the community. Chat with fans, share your passion, and celebrate every victory together. On DAZN, every game is a social event.

DAZN brings you the ultimate sports streaming experience with a world of content available anytime, anywhere:

• Dive into the “Home of Boxing”, featuring top events, schedules, fighter profiles, and exclusive content, including Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship (BKFC).
• Stay up-to-date with the “Schedule” feature, setting alerts for your favourite games across sports like American Football, Basketball, and Tennis.
• Navigate effortlessly with the new sub-navigation bar to quickly access your favourite competitions like Serie A. 
• Get real-time “Stats and Scores” for all games, including Men’s Football, the National League, and major tournaments like the NFL Game Pass and Courtside 1891.
• Explore full “Fight Cards” for boxing and MMA events, including the Professional Fighters League (PFL), and revisit past rounds with a single click.
• Engage with fans in the “FanZone” by cheering, chatting, sending reactions, and participating in polls.
• Manage your account with ease using the updated profile section.
• Browse and watch a variety of live channels with the EPG for live channels feature, including content from Red Bull TV, Padel TIME TV, and thrilling events like Riyadh Season.

DAZN holds the world’s largest portfolio of sports broadcasting rights, including:
• History-making fights from Matchroom Promotions, Queensbury, Golden Boy Promotions, and BKFC.
• Exclusive access to NFL Game Pass, bringing every game of the NFL.
• European football including Serie A and National League.
• NHL.TV: Experience every game from every team, live and on demand all season long. The world’s best hockey, all in one place.
• All the action from the NCAA College Football season.
• Basketball action, including Courtside 1891.
• The best of live Women’s Football, including Liga F, NWSL, and Frauen-Bundesliga.
• Exciting MMA content from the Professional Fighters League (PFL), Naciones MMA, and more.
• Unique sports like Padel, global tournaments in Tennis, and diverse events like Riyadh Season.
• Over 10 linear TV channels on our platform with 24/7 content, including Red Bull TV, Matchroom Snooker, Lacrosse TV, and more.
• A rich library of video-on-demand (VOD) content, including sports documentaries, features, and shows.

DAZN is your gateway to sports, bringing you closer to the action than ever before.

Get unrivalled coverage of Europe's ultimate club football competition. The official UEFA Champions League app brings you the latest soccer news, scores, draws, live coverage, next-day video highlights and our free Fantasy Football game.
 
FOLLOW THE UEFA CHAMPIONS LEAGUE
 
- Get live minute-by-minute updates from every single match.
- With the live bracket, see the path to the final – and watch it update live as goals go in.
- Simulate scorelines and see how they might affect the knockout stages.
- Don’t miss a single goal thanks to real-time push notifications.
- Listen to live match commentary on the go.
- Review the goals in detail with next-day highlights for every match*.
- Get live match statistics for every game.
- Access all the fixtures and up-to-date standings.
- Read the latest football news and analysis from UEFA experts.
- Dive straight into the news that matters to you with our personalised home feed.
- Watch the live draws.
- Get a heads up with notifications for all kick-offs, confirmed line-ups and draws.
- Keep up to speed on each club thanks to in-depth form guides about the top teams in the Premier League, La Liga, Serie A and the Bundesliga.
- Analyse individual team pages, squads and player pages
- Have your say by voting for your Player and Goal of the Week after each matchday.
 
EXPLORE THE ARCHIVES
 
- Access all-time player statistics: everything from the top goalscorer to the most yellow cards.
- Access all-time club statistics and results: everything from the most titles to the most goals conceded.
- Browse stats and videos from past winners such as Real Madrid, Liverpool, Barcelona, Ajax, AC Milan, Manchester United, Juventus, Bayern Munich, Chelsea and more.
- Watch match highlights from past seasons. 
- Watch highlight compilations curated by UEFA experts.
 
PLAY FANTASY FOOTBALL
 
- Play our free Fantasy game and pick your UCL dream team from Europe’s best soccer stars, including players from La Liga, the Premier League, Serie A and the Bundesliga.
- Spend your €100m budget wisely and score points based on your players’ real-life performances.
- Compete against your friends by creating and joining leagues.
- Check player stats to make the best selection decisions.
- Join leagues with other supporters from your club. If you’re a Real Madrid fan, compete against other Real Madrid fans. If you’re a Juventus fan, battle against other Juventus fans on the Juve fans’ leaderboard.
- Play Fantasy Football and live UEFA Champions League nights in a whole new way!

*Highlights available from midnight wherever you are in the world

Want to stay connected to all things Champions League?
Download the app for free now to get the definitive UEFA Champions League coverage, straight from the home of European football.

The official BBC Sport app offers the latest sports news, scores, live sport and highlights. It's the best way to follow all the latest sporting action!

BBC Sport brings you some of the world's biggest events — Olympic Games, UEFA Euros and FIFA World Cup football, Wimbledon, Commonwealth Games, Six Nations plus Premier League football, cricket, golf, rugby league, the NFL and much more.

SPORTS NEWS
The BBC Sport app brings you all the breaking news across the world of sport including football, cricket, rugby union, rugby league, F1, tennis, golf, athletics and much more. Read all of the latest headlines, football gossip, transfer rumours and league action as the stories unfold. You can even share news stories and sports results with your friends and followers across your social channels.

SPORT RESULTS
Never again do you have to miss any of the latest action. The BBC Sport app offers in-depth results, analysis, live scores, match stats and text commentaries — keeping you up-to-date with all the action when you’re on the go. 

MY SPORT
Create a personalised “My Sport” page to bring together the stories, results and fixtures for the sports you love. Choose from over 300 different topics to follow including your favourite team or sports.

TOP FLIGHT FOOTBALL
As well as our football and Premier League pages, each team in England's top flight also has their own page — a one-stop shop for all the best digital content about that club, including insight and analysis from journalists and pundits across the BBC, plus the best of social media.

And, of course, you also get your fixtures, results, tables and player stats.

Want the biggest news and match updates from your team sent direct to your phone or tablet? Then download the BBC Sport app and sign up to notifications.

With news notifications for all 20 Premier League sides, you will have the biggest stories and the best content about your club at your fingertips.

ALERTS
Receive personalised notifications that get delivered directly to your locked screen. Set notifications for top sports stories, plus more than 400 football teams, dozens of cricket and rugby teams and every Formula 1 race!

AROUND THE BBC
Discover the best sporting content from around the BBC via the BBC Sport app including podcasts through BBC Sounds, exclusive content on BBC iPlayer and more. 

------
Please note a network connection and a BBC Account are required to access content. https://www.bbc.co.uk/usingthebbc/account/ 
If you install this app you accept the BBC Terms of Use at https://www.bbc.co.uk/terms. Find out about your privacy rights and the BBC’s Privacy and Cookies Policy at https://www.bbc.co.uk/privacy. To give you the best experience and to enable the features listed above this app stores data around your usage of the app. You can read more about this and can turn off any or all data tracking by following the instructions in our privacy notice - https://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/44130693

Upgrade your game.

HomeCourt is the free, interactive basketball app that helps anyone get better. It’s the personal basketball trainer that’s always with you, capturing your performance, your stats, and your progress—guiding you to the next level. With HomeCourt, every rep counts. 

TRAIN SMARTER
HomeCourt captures your moves and your stats as you train—so you can see your true skill level. HomeCourt uses the camera on your device to track your performance in real-time, everything from your jump shot to your crossover. In-depth data and analytics help you break down every session. HomeCourt calculates metrics like shooting percentage, accuracy, release time, dribble speed, vertical jump and more. You can even use Apple Watch to track your heart rate and save your data to HealthKit. 

ENGAGE IN FUN, INTERACTIVE DRILLS
Using HomeCourt is less like training and more like a video game. The immersive live-action experience is powered by AR (augmented reality), with virtual targets, audio cues, bonus levels, points and badges—it’s like you’re inside the game. Now practicing skills is engaging, not boring, so you’ll stick to it and improve more. 

LEARN FROM THE PROS
HomeCourt is an official partner of the NBA and provides access to the expertise of the most elite players in the game today. Train with interactive drills and instruction from NBA and WNBA athletes. Learn their moves and even compete against them in interactive challenges. 

COMPETE WITH FRIENDS
Don’t workout alone, compete virtually with your friends, family, and teammates. You can join a virtual Team on HomeCourt, or create your own Team for free. You can also challenge a friend or teammate to any HomeCourt activity with a time-shifted “Battle Mode” that matches you up head-to-head. As you compete in Battles, you collect trophies, badges, and coins, just like you would in a video game. Earn rewards and level up together.

SHOWCASE YOUR SKILLS
Engage in unique showcase activities and even get discovered directly by the NBA. Participants who opt-in to NBA Global Scout are eligible to receive invitations to select NBA tryouts, camps, tournaments, and showcases. As you build your profile on HomeCourt, you can also share your progress with individual coaches and scouts.

--
SET UP
HomeCourt is ready to use everywhere you bring your iPhone or iPad. No special basketballs, uncomfortable sensors, or expensive equipment is required. Just set up your phone with a clear view of the court and starting training and competing through HomeCourt.

PRICING
• Free: Access the full library of 100+ drills and activities. Get unlimited shot tracking.
• HomeCourt Plus: Access your full workout history, get complete skill ratings, join the members-only training club, request feedback from HomeCourt pro trainers, participate in HomeCourt Global Camp, and create up to 4 user profiles.

HomeCourt Plus is available for subscription as either monthly or yearly auto-renewable subscriptions. Payment will be charged to your App Store account upon the expiration of the free trial period. Subscription automatically renews unless the subscription is canceled or auto-renew turned off at least 24 hours before the expiration of the free trial period or the current subscription period. Subscription may be managed and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to App Store account settings after purchase. Please visit https://www.homecourt.ai/legal/terms for the complete terms of use.

Got any questions or feedback?
Please shoot us an email at support@homecourt.ai. We'd love to hear from you.

Huba Football is your all-in-one destination for immersive and real-time football live scores. Whether you're tracking live matches, analyzing team stats or individual player performance, Huba Football brings you closer to the game with clarity and depth.

App Key Features:

* Live Scores & Match Center:
Follow every match as it happens with real-time scores, game status updates, and live commentary. Home, away, and neutral venues are clearly displayed with intuitive UI.

* Detailed Match Statistics:
Access comprehensive team stats including shots on/off goal, blocked shots, fouls, corner kicks, and pass accuracy — all visualized in a clean and readable format.

* Fixtures & Results:
Stay up to date with ongoing, upcoming, and past fixtures. Navigate through daily match schedules and browse through historical results.

* Lineups & Formations:
View team formations with visual representation. Analyze how each team sets up with formations like 4-2-3-1, including detailed player positions.

* Goal & Event Timelines:
Track every key match moment: goals (normal and penalties), player substitutions, yellow/red cards, and more — all timestamped and structured.

* Player Profiles & Stats:
Explore in-depth player statistics such as goals, assists, passes completed, dribbles attempted/successful, and more. Access player transfer history and trophy achievements per season.

* Instant Push Notifications:
Get notified in real-time for match starts, goals, cards, and final results — never miss a moment that matters.

* Team Overview & Stadium Info:
Discover team insights including home ground details, stadium capacity, playing surface, and recent form with last 6 game results.

* Latest Football News:
Browse football headlines tailored for you. View articles with images and story highlights from the football world, all updated daily.

* Search & Discover Leagues:
Easily search for global competitions with season filters. Quickly access league details and navigate through team performances.

* Cards Stats:
Monitor discipline across competitions — view players with red card stats in structured and ranked format.

* Transfer History & Trophies:
Follow a player’s career journey with transfer movements and club changes. Also explore their earned trophies and seasonal accolades.

Huba Football is designed for fans who crave precision, clarity, and real-time interaction with the beautiful game. No official team or league names are required — just pure football data delivered intelligently. Download Huba Football app now.

New Real Madrid App, the place where you can find all the football and basketball information with match pre-match coverage, live scores, post-match coverage, standings, exclusive news, and much more!

Hello, Madridrista! This is the new and improved Real Madrid App, your window into exclusive news from the football and basketball world. 

What does the Real Madrid App have to offer?
1. The pre-match coverage: find out the squads and line-ups before anyone else.
2. Follow the game live: our live coverage combined with real-time statistics, commentary from our team, and exclusive views of the pitch.
3. Post-match: relive the best moments with videos, reports and quotes from players and coaching staff.
4. News: everything about the club and the players, from Bellingham, Modric, Vinicius, etc.
5. Fixtures and league tables: men's and women's football and basketball. Follow any competition: LaLiga, Champions League, Copa del Rey...
6. Real Madrid TV on your mobile: all the programming for the next few days.
7. Official Integrated Shop: with a 5% discount on your first purchase as a Madridista.
8. Your Private Member or Madridista Area: with exclusive benefits such as discounts, draws, and priority ticket purchases.
9. Dark Mode: you choose how to experience the Madridista emotion!
And so much more!

How much does the Real Madrid App cost?
It's totally free. Enjoy your favorite content at no cost.

Which Apple devices is it available for?
You can use it on iPhone and iPad.

Is it available in other languages?
The app is available in both English and Spanish.

Download the App now and enjoy every moment with your white heart, Hala Madrid!

Privacy Policy: https://www.realmadrid.com/en-US/legal/privacy-policy

GolfFix is an AI golf swing analyzer and personalized AI coaching app designed to improve your game and create a stress-free golf life. Tired of finding the right golf coach? Feeling stuck with your golf skills even though you are getting lessons and training? Feeling frustrated because of an inconsistent golf swing? Wanting to get a longer distance? GolfFix can solve all your problems!

Utilizing AI vision technology, GolfFix provides golf swing analysis and virtual golf coaching that auto-detects your flaws, providing immediate, detailed analysis and plan to improve your swing skills and accuracy. Practice with GolfFix to get your swing analysis & reports!

Advanced AI Swing Analysis
- Automatically detects and records your swing from address to finish, generating a complete swing sequence directly from your recording or imported video 
- Advanced issue detection that identifies over 45 swing issues using AI, each paired with a clear explanation, recommended solution, and visual example
 - Compare your swing with professionals or your past swings to measure improvement technique 
- Access AI-powered shot fix lessons that target your specific swing issues (Slice, Hook, Pull, Push, Loss of Distance, Skying, Fat Shot, Topping, Shank, Toe Shot)

Rhythm, Swing Tempo Analysis & Golf Practice Drills Tools
- Analyze your golf swing’s rhythm and tempo
- Break down your swing into 4 parts to calculate the accurate rhythm and tempo; swing tempo, backswing, top pause, downswing
- Training drills and proven techniques to make your rhythm and tempo consistent

Focus Drill
- Provides the right training and practice drills according to your level and swing style
- Instant analysis and feedback on every practice swing you’ve made - no time to waste!

Monthly AI Report
- Monthly reports to see the results of your golf lessons
- Compare and track your progress with yourself and other users’
- Check the most commonly occurred issue of your golf swing
- Highlight the most improved issue of your golf swing mechanics and techniques
- Track your daily practice streak
- Review your average posture score over the month and compare your lowest and highest scored swing

Global Golfer Community
- Share your swings, tips, and golf experiences with players around the world in an engaging community hub
- Communicate freely across languages with built-in translation that keeps conversations effortless and inclusive.

Premium Features
- Advanced AI analysis
- Personalized swing recording, analysis and lessons
- Shot fix lesson
- Monthly report 
- Rhythm, Tempo, Focus Drill mode
- Unlimited swing log view 
- Swing video Sync
- 60 FPS video support (device may vary)
- No ads

With GolfFix, today is the best day of your golf life.

-------------------------------------------

[Notice]
- If any problem or error occurs while using Golf Fix, please don't hesitate to leave comments.
- Any suggestions for new features are always welcomed and appreciated.
- Inquiry : help@golffix.io
- Privacy Policy : https://www.moais.co.kr/golffix-terms-en-privacyinfo
- the terms of use: https://www.moais.co.kr/golffix-terms-en-tos
-  privacy policy and Terms of Use (EULA) : https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Get ready for unrivalled coverage of the UEFA Women's Champions League!

The official Women's Champions League app brings you the best football from the top of the European club game, including live match streams, news, stats, live scores, analysis and video.

- Follow minute-by-minute updates for every match.
- Manage your own dream team in the UWCL Fantasy Football game.
- Track the numbers with live stats for each game.
- Review the goals in detail with next-day highlights for every match.
- With the live bracket, see the path to the final – and watch it update live as goals go in.
- Select your favourite soccer team and go straight to the news that matters to you.
- Read all the latest news and expert analysis from UEFA's reporters.
- Get an alert before anyone else as soon as official line-ups are announced.
- Never miss a goal thanks to real-time push notifications.
- Dig into the data with player and team stats over the course of the competition.
- Check the fixtures and standings throughout the season.
- Watch videos and highlights packages curated by UEFA experts.
- Vote for your Goal of the Week.
- Expand your knowledge of the top players with regular articles on the players to watch.
- Track the race for the competition's top scorer.
- Watch the livestream of the draws for the group stage and knockout rounds.

This is the easiest place to follow the competition that brings together the finest soccer teams from Europe's top leagues, including England's Women's Super League, Spain's Liga F, Germany's Frauen-Bundesliga, France's Division 1 Féminine, Italy's Serie A Femminile and more.

Follow all the top clubs as they progress through the tournament, including Barcelona, Lyon, Chelsea, Juventus, Wolfsburg, Paris Saint-Germain, Bayern Munich, Real Madrid and Roma, among others.

With the official app, you'll be able to watch the draws live as each team finds out who they'll be playing against on the road to the final.

Between matchdays, get up to speed with everything that's happening at the top of the women's game! You'll find a wide range of news articles profiling the biggest stars and best club teams, as well as detailed stats from every game.

Check the calendar for upcoming fixtures to see who's playing who, and learn more about each opponent with match previews and form guides.

Throughout the competition, you'll be able to keep up-to-date with all the football across Europe with real-time notifications. Follow your favourite team and configure your settings to get goal alerts, line-up announcements and more.

And once the matches have finished, see the results of every game, the standings in each group – plus how each goal affects the top scorers' charts.

Then, watch all the goals back with free highlights in the app, as well as curated video packages. And you can even make your voice heard by voting for the Goal of the Week for each matchday!

Download the app today to take your enjoyment of the UEFA Women's Champions League to a whole new level!

New features:
· In Player Info, The biggest-ever update to stats makes it easier to find players' records in every game they played and theirs market values in the different period. N
· In Club Info, users can browse thousands of clubs' ranking changes throughout the years around world. Users can also check every coaches' winning rates in a club's history.
More than 20m downloads from over 150 countries! Top 10 in 98+ countries! 
※ Main Features of All Football
Football News, Live Scores, Match Details, Chatroom, Transfer News, Videos & Highlights, Professional Stats, etc.

“All Football” app provides you with the latest and comprehensive football news, live scores, match videos and highlights. With “All Football” app, you can follow your favorite teams and players, get live scores and results from all the matches and competitions as well as the latest Football news all around the world. Everything you need to know about football, all at your fingertips.
Here’s the description of the main Features of “All Football”.

- Football news 
Our app provides you with the latest football news all around the world. You can also acquire personalized content based on teams you support like Real Madrid, FC Barcelona, Manchester united, Chelsea, Liverpool, Crystal Palace, Everton, Dortmund, and your favorite players like Cristiano Ronaldo, Lionel Messi, David Villa, Kaka, etc. With our app you will not miss any news about the team you support or your favorite football star.

- Match Live

app_name: 得物 - 得到美好事物
developer: Shanghai Dewu Information Group Co., Ltd.
description:
得物App是集潮流装备、潮流商品鉴别、潮流生活社区于一体的新一代潮流网购社区。 
-鉴别服务开创者- 
得物App在传统电商模式的基础上添加“鉴别服务”，实现“先鉴别，后发货”的购物流程。“多道鉴别查验工序”的平台品控，为新世代消费者带来更安心的网购体验。 
-潮流网购- 
得物App签约了数百位业内具有多年以上经验的潮流商品鉴别师。鉴别师除了是骨灰大神级Sneaker玩家和潮人，更是潮流领域的“研究人员”。通过对球鞋、服装、配饰、潮玩、数码3C、美妆等产品进行系统性研究，包括资料收集、数据对比、档案建立、样本拆解和仪器检测等，力保鉴别的准确性。还设有独立的查验环节，对存在瑕疵的商品进行排查，拦截明显瑕疵商品，针对存在微小瑕疵的商品与用户提前一对一沟通，确保用户购买到经鉴别查验为无瑕疵商品。 
• 潮流单品：得物App目前支持交易的潮流单品品类丰富。 
• 竞价模式：得物App采取商品竞价出价的平台交易模式，竞价模式提供了每个用户获得公平交易机会。 
• 商品3D全息空间：得物App采集球鞋的3D影像展示。用户浏览实现可操控式自转，720度无死角查看单品的材质、图案、纹理、设计细节，为用户打造不一样的沉浸式购物体验。 
-潮流生活社区- 
得物App致力于打造年轻人的潮流生活社区，成为中国潮流文化风向标和年轻人的发声阵地。得物App社区聚集了一众明星以及潮流圈内数百位知名KOL。我们以球鞋和时尚话题作为潮流文化的切入点，持续沉淀潮流向内容，培育潮流文化沃土。得物App社区积极拓展符合年轻人消费观的品类内容，深度挖掘年轻人处于萌芽期的兴趣点。 

了解更多得物App相关，可通过以下方式： 
官方微博：得物App 
官方抖音：得物App 
微信公众号：得物App 
微信小程序：得物App 
意见反馈：打开得物App-我-设置-反馈与建议

The World Football Live app by Sportsmate brings you all the stats, scores and news from not just the Premier League but all of Europe’s biggest competitions including the UEFA Champion’s League, UEFA Europa League, La Liga, Bundesliga. PLUS international tournaments: World Cup, EUROs, Copa America
It's built by football fans, for football fans, combining up-to-the-second live scores from every match with the most in-depth statistical database, as well as exclusive analysis and the latest breaking football news and video highlights.
Whether it’s the Manchester Derby, the drama of the North London derby, or the excitement of an extra time goal in the Champion’s League, we’ve got you covered. Don’t just follow your club, join them!
FOLLOW LIVE
Access live coverage of every EPL, UEFA Champion’s League, UEFA Europa League, La Liga, Bundesliga, Serie A and Ligue 1. PLUS international competitions; World Cup, EUROs, Copa America
Live scores for each match
Play-by-play match commentary
Detailed match stats, player stats, team lists and shot maps
Player specific stat sheets and shot maps
TRACK YOUR FAVOURITE TEAM AND PLAYERS
Follow the progress of your club and your favourite players throughout the season.
Follow every thing to do with your club in the dedicated Team News tab
Watch all your team’s highlights after their match
Stay up to date with the latest club news and team tweets
Keep an eye on your favourite players and their injury status
GET THE STATS
Up to date club and player stat rankings
Leaderboards for individual stats and KPIs
Individual player profiles and career stats
Compare players head to head
STAY UP TO DATE
World Football Live by Sportsmate also brings you the breaking football news from Europe’s biggest football leagues, along with exclusive match previews (and tips) as well as analysis from Sportsmate’s team of commentators from around the world.
A thorough overview of the day’s play from around the country via the Match Day tab
Access news and updates about club teams
Watch and listen to videos and podcast series on demand
Personalise alerts so you never miss any of the action, goals or latest news
DOWNLOAD NOW
World Football Live by Sportsmate is available FREE for all football enthusiasts around the world. Don’t miss a minute, download now and start tracking live football scores today!
NEW FEATURES COMING SOON
We’re constantly releasing updates and improving our apps so we’d love to hear from you how we could make the World Football Live app even better. Please send all feedback to support@sportsmatemobile.com, tweet us at @‌Sportsmate or use the feedback form inside your app’s Settings.
ABOUT THE DEVELOPERS
Founded in 2009 and based in Melbourne, Australia, Sportsmate Mobile is an Independent Sports Media company which creates and distributes mobile applications focused on delivering lightning fast sport scores and stats to sports fans all over the world.
With over 10 million global downloads, we are Australia's number one sports app network. Our growing suite of apps is built by a dedicated team of sports mad app developers, designers and content creators who are passionate about delivering content sports fans crave.

Stay closer to the beautiful Sports with LOLA FOOTBALL, the all-in-one app for live match updates, team stats, competition standings, and football news. Designed with a modern and intuitive interface, LOLA FOOTBALL ensures you never miss a moment – whether it’s a live score, upcoming fixture, player transfer or breaking story.

* LOLA FOOTBALL App Key Features *

Live Match Updates:
  • Follow matches in real time with instant scores, timelines, and in-game events.
  • Get updates on goals, substitutions, yellow/red cards and key highlights.

Fixtures & Results:
  • Access upcoming schedules, recent matches, and detailed results for every competition.
  • Match info includes kick-off times, stadium details and final outcomes.

Competitions & Standings:
  • Explore a wide range of domestic leagues, international tournaments and regional cups.
  • Stay updated with live standings, points tables and rankings as the season unfolds.

Team & Player Details:
  • Browse complete team squads with player profiles, positions and stats.
  • View official line-ups and formations before kick-off.
  • Track injury reports and availability updates for each player.

Player & Match Statistics:
  • In-depth match data: shots, possession, fouls, offsides, corners and more.

Transfers & Market Updates:
  • Stay informed with the latest transfer activity, including player movements and fees.
  • Track free transfers, confirmed deals and squad changes.

Football Update News:

Head-to-Head & Analysis:
  • Compare teams with H2H history: wins, draws, losses and previous results.

Season Highlights:

Download Our LOLA FOOTBALL App today and experience the Sports like never before!
